Adrs = booking[(booking['is_canceled']==0)].groupby(['name']).sum()[['adr']]
FirstFiveTooAdr = Adrs.sort_values('adr',ascending=False)[0:5]
FirstFiveTooAdr = FirstFiveTooAdr.reset_index()['name']
FirstFiveTooAdr = tuple(FirstFiveTooAdr)

    
GroupingMonth = booking.groupby(['name','arrival_date_month']).sum()[['adr']]
GroupingMonth = GroupingMonth.reset_index()
GroupingMonth = GroupingMonth[GroupingMonth['name'].isin(FirstFiveTooAdr)]

plt.figure(figsize=(12,8))
sas.scatterplot(data=GroupingMonth, x='adr', y='arrival_date_month',hue='name')

plt.legend(bbox_to_anchor =(0.3,1,1,0))
